korean: 블랙프라이데이 세일을 기다렸다가 오늘 대량 구매했다.
평소에 사고 싶었던 것들을 장바구니에 담아뒀다가 한꺼번에 샀어.
할인율이 진짜인지 의심스럽긴 하지만 그래도 만족스럽다.
몇몇 제품은 원래 가격이 올려져 있었던 것 같기도 해.
그래도 이럴 때 사야 본전인 것 같다.
할인 기간이 자정에 끝나서 마지막까지 고민했어.
결제하고 나니까 뿌듯하면서도 돈이 많이 나간 게 좀 아깝더라.
그래도 필요한 것들이었으니까 나중에 살 것보다 낫지.
배송이 늦어질 수 있다고 해서 좀 걱정되긴 해.
다음 주쯤엔 다 받을 수 있을 것 같아.
다음 블랙프라이데이 때는 더 계획적으로 사야겠다.
충동구매한 것도 몇 개 있어서 반성 중이야.
english: I waited for the Black Friday sale and, like, did a massive shopping haul today.
I had added things I wanted to buy to my cart and bought them all at once.
I'm a bit suspicious whether the discounts are real, but honestly, I'm still satisfied.
Some products actually seemed like their original prices were inflated.
But still, I feel like you have to buy during times like this to break even.
I bought a ton of stuff - electronics, clothes, and shoes.
My friends were all busy shopping too.
The sale ended at midnight, so I was literally deciding until the last minute.
After checking out, I felt proud but also kind of regretful about spending so much money.
But I guess it's better than buying them later since these were things I needed.
They said shipping might be delayed, so I'm a bit worried.
I think I'll receive everything by next week.
Next Black Friday, I should shop more strategically.
I'm feeling a bit guilty because I also made some impulse purchases.
